answer:
The mumps vaccine is combined with the measles and rubella vaccine (MMR vaccine). Please contact a local health unit and ask to speak to a Public Health Nurse who can review your immunization history to see if you qualify for publicly funded (free) vaccine. If not, you may purchase MMR vaccine from a pharmacy or travel clinic. You can find the number for your local health unit here.
Immunization Nurse
question: where can an out of province adult get a mumps vaccination
